name: INGO Digital Transformation
description: INGO, a well-established Italian company, successfully operates in the development of solutions able to ensure a smooth and efficient, as well as increasingly multichannel and up-to-date customer experience. Through an integrated ecosystem of services and products dedicated to the innovative management of customer relations, INGO provides companies with consultancy, technologies and cross-channel services for digital transformation. We support companies in digital transformation processes, offering consultancy , services and technologies dedicated to the innovative and omnichannel management of relationships . 5 offices in Italy, over 100 partners worldwide, 800 employees, a technological research and development hub , more than 450 projects carried out every year .

Highlights.name: Outbound Solutions
Highlights.description: Turn contacts into wins with INGO's Outbound services. From Teleselling to Appointment Taking and Customer Surveys, our experience enables us to create advanced strategies to maximize sales and consolidate your market presence.

Highlights.name: Inbound Solutions
Highlights.description: Explore the world of customer service excellence with INGO's Inbound Services. Our customized multichannel support, operating 24/7, is based on innovative technologies and a highly specialized team.

Highlights.name: Sectoral Expertise
Highlights.description: We have a history as a solution provider that allows us to provide outstanding services in a variety of industries, such as healthcare, finance, utilities, e-commerce, manufacturing, and green tech. This industry knowledge enables INGO to offer customized solutions for specific customer needs.

enhanced_description: INGO Digital Transformation provides a comprehensive suite of consultancy, technologies, and cross-channel services to support companies in their digital transformation journeys. While primarily focused on enabling a smooth, efficient, and omnichannel customer experience, INGO's integrated ecosystem of services and products also addresses key HR business objectives. These include building a more diverse and inclusive workforce and accelerating skill development and learning efficiency, leveraging solutions like Corporate LMS and machine learning for HR, and offering specialized services in learning and development and diversity and inclusion. With a global footprint through 5 offices in Italy and over 100 worldwide partners, INGO delivers customized solutions backed by a technological research and development hub and a highly specialized team, catering to industries such as healthcare, finance, utilities, e-commerce, manufacturing, and green tech.
